item.title: CVE-2024-4433|2024-05-02T15:37:07.370Z -- Mr Digital -- Simple Image Popup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mr Digital Simple Image Popup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Image Popup: from n/a through 2.4.0.
